title: Level capsule only gave me one champ not the normal 4?

embed.description: Preseason is here, and preseason is disgusting. I'm frightened and spooked. Twitter - https://twitter.com/BrickyOrchid8 Twitch - http://www.twitch.tv/brickyorchid8 BigBrickPlays - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHcODW8jrSHWw7Na0dC6qcA Instagram - BrickyO8 Ironside Computers | Click here to customize your own PC - http://ironsidecomputers.com LF Gaming Chairs - https://lfgaming.com/shop/?ref=11 P.O. Box BrickyOrchid8 22365 El Toro Road.

body:
It seems to me from all my friends its average to get 4 champion shards from a level caption but i only got one, Wukong, were as my friends and you-tubers have all gotten 4? i'm just wanting to know if it was a bug or if its a random amount of shards
 
Using bricky as one example he states how he got 4 champions from the level capsule at about 5:40 into the video is when he states it

i am just confused and confuzzled 
cheers

replies.body: I only get 1 or 2 grom each capsule as well. Mostly 1. You're not alone
